entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
